HALF - Static variable in class org.group7.view.GameWindow
 
handleCollision(Piece) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.Entity
The handleCollision function takes in the colliding piece as a parameter and should appropritely handle the collision depending on its type which can be - Two pieces of the same color.
handleCollision(Piece) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.piece.Piece
The handleCollision function calls the handleCollision method of the state object, passing in the Piece object and its handler as parameters.
handleCollision(Piece) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.powerups.BasePowerUp
The handleCollision function takes in the colliding piece as a parameter and uses the handler to "execute" the effects of the base power-up.
handleCollision(Piece) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.powerups.LaserPowerUp
The handleCollision function takes in the colliding piece as a parameter and uses the handler to "execute" the effects of the laser power-up.
handleCollision(Piece) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.powerups.LightningPowerUp
The handleCollision function takes in the colliding piece as a parameter and uses the handler to "execute" the effects of the lightning power-up.
handleCollision(Piece) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.powerups.PowerUp
The handleCollision function takes in the colliding piece as a parameter and the implementation should use the handler to "execute" the power-up.
handleCollision(Piece, IMoveHandler) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.piece.FieldState
The handleCollision function calls the addPiece method of the handler object, handlnig collisions with both pieces of the same color and pieces of different colors.
handleCollision(Piece, IMoveHandler) - Method in class org.group7.model.entities.piece.GoalStretchState
The handleCollision function calls the addPiece method of the handler object, passing in the piece's position + 1 modulo the number of outer tiles.
handleCollision(Piece, IMoveHandler) - Method in interface org.group7.model.entities.piece.PieceState
The handleCollision function shold use the handler object to place the piece on the appropriate tile and handle any potential collisions.
